Package com.quantimodo.android.sdk.login

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthenticatorActivity.QMAuthClient.OnAuthenticationCompleteListener  
    CallbackManager  
    CallbackManagerImpl.Callback  
    LoginCallback
    Interface used to deliver the result from a login process
    QuantimodoSDKHelper.AuthListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticatorActivity
    Activity for auth, used in pair with AuthHelper
    AuthenticatorActivity.QMAuthClient  
    CallbackManager.Factory
    The factory class for the CallbackManager.
    CallbackManagerImpl  
    LoginManager
    Performs the login starting the proper Activity and delivers the result on a callback or as Activity Result.
    QuantimodoSDKHelper
    Class that encapsulate work with tokens and auth Tokens stored in private shared preferences This class should be use as Singleton, in most cases it would be injected as dependency
    QuantimodoSDKHelper.AuthToken  
    ToolsPrefs
    Configuration of toolprefs and quantimodo app
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NoNetworkConnection
    Thrown if there is no internet connection
